[u][b]Information[/b][/u] [SIZE=3]Vanguard is developed with the sole purpose of creating quality gameplay for the playerbase. The opinions of players are always taken into account with each and every update. Vanguard strives itself on having professional management that treats the community with great respect, which they deserve for giving us their time.[/SIZE]
[URL=http://"http://vanguardrsps.ipbhost.com/index.php?/topic/956-50-giveaway/#entry2962"]Click here for a $50 giveaway[/URL]
[SPOILER=Recruitment Program] If you have the ability to recruit a high volume of players (10+) please contact me, as we are happy to pay you a nominal fee for each player. [/SPOILER]
[u][b]Links[/b][/u] Play: [URL=http://"http://vanguardrsps.ipbhost.com/index.php?/topic/759-play/?p=2354"]Click Here[/URL] Direct Download: [URL=http://"http://vanguardrsps.com/Vanguard.zip"]Click Here[/URL] Youtube: [URL=http://"https://www.youtube.com/channel/UChmeenpeCVD7SnZj1pB1gAA/videos"]Click Here[/URL]
[u][b]Features[/b][/u] - 15 Bosses - - 10 Minigames - - Gambling - - 100% Grand Exchange - - All Skills 100% - - Automatic Donating - - Fullscreen & Resizable - - Map Modes - - Custom Maps - - Unique Gambling Systems - - Flowers & Dicing - - Fog - - Awesome teleport system - - All stairs & ladders -
[SPOILER=Bosses]
